name: "Tiny House Road Trip!" & "Our Magic Castle"
description:
Title: Tiny House Road Trip!

Players: 1 or 2
Time: 2 hours
Content: tiny houses, photography, walking around, giant animals
Summary: Walk around, taking pictures of a tiny house and its occupant.

Title: Our Magic Castle 

Players: 1 or 2
Time: 2 hours
Content: tiny houses, home decor, communal living
Summary: Design sweet apartments for foldable animal friends.
